document_data.name: Therry
document_data.mainbody: '''Therry''' was an individual taking notes for the Watch of [[Marsember]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the early spring of {{yearlink|1373}}, after [[Glarasteer Rhauligan]], a [[Harper]], and the quarry he was pursuing, the [[Waterdhavian]] [[thief]] [[Narnra Shalace]] escaped the Watch in Marsember by leaping into a canal, one of his superiors gave Therry the order to record them as drowned lovers.
